summary: A middle class young woman, who dreams of Bollywood fame, is caught in a love triangle between her childhood friend and a famous actor.
cast: Urmila Matondkar|Aamir Khan|Jackie Shroff|Gulshan Grover|Avtar Gill|Achyut Potdar|Reema Lagoo|Ram Mohan|Shammi|Shefali Shah|Rajesh Joshi|Suman|Tarun|Rajeev Mehta|Ramdas|Nitin Chandrakant Desai|K.B. Jatin|Haniif Sheikh|Himanshu|Madhur Bhandarkar|Remo D'Souza|Sanjay Goradia|Saroj Khan|Aditya Narayan|Neeraj Vora
director: Director: Ram Gopal Varma (as Ramgopal Varma)
title: Rangeela
